Title: Relates to the abolition of offices or positions and the seniority rights of teachers and teaching assistants within a certain tenure area
Summary: Relates to the abolition of offices or positions and the seniority rights of teachers and teaching assistants within a certain tenure area.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the abolition of offices or positions and the seniority rights of teachers and teaching assistants within a certain tenure area
